info.title: Laravel Survey API
info.description:
A comprehensive survey management API built with Laravel, featuring:
 * - Multi-role authentication (Admin, User, LINE OA)
 * - Real-time survey updates via WebSocket broadcasting
 * - Advanced analytics and reporting
 * - Export/Import functionality for surveys and responses
 * - Tiered rate limiting for security
 * - Email verification and password reset

get.description: Retrieve overall analytics data for admin dashboard
Get paginated list of all surveys with filtering options
Get paginated list of all registered users
Get paginated list of all LINE OA users
